text: unake nabee ne unase kaha, "usakee baadashaahee kee nishaanee yah hai ki vah sandook tumhaare par aa jaega, jisamen tumhaare rah kee or se sakeenat (prashaanti) aur moosa ke logon aur haaroon ke logon kee chhodee huee yaadagaaren hain, jisako farishte uthae hue honge. yadi tum eemaanavaale ho to, nissandeh isamen tumhaare lie badee nishaanee hai.
